name: ListGroupRelationships
description:
Retrieve a list of group relationships for a given owner.

Use this tool to get group relationship records, including one membership and multiple admin records for an owner.

parameters.name: number_of_rows
parameters.description: Specify the number of rows to return in the response.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to navigate to the next or previous portion of the collection.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: filter_by_organization
parameters.description: Filter results by organization. Provide the organization ID or URI to narrow down the list of group relationships.

value_schema.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: filter_by_owner_uri
parameters.description: The URI to filter results by owner, either an Organization Membership URI or Organization Invitation URI.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the results should be filtered by owner
One Of: - Organization Membership URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organization_memberships/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA` - Organization Invitation URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organizations/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA/invitations/BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB`

parameters.name: filter_by_group
parameters.description: Filter results by a specific group using a group identifier.

value_schema.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by group

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by organization

value_schema.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description:
Indicates the results should be filtered by owner
One Of: - Organization Membership URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organization_memberships/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA` - Organization Invitation URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organizations/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA/invitations/BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB`

value_schema.description:
Indicates the results should be filtered by owner
One Of: - Organization Membership URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organization_memberships/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA` - Organization Invitation URI - `https://api.calendly.com/organizations/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA/invitations/BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB`

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by group

value_schema.description: Indicates the results should be filtered by group

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
